bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, front derailleur internal cable routing, stealth-routing ready, magnesium EVO Link, Mino Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 150mm travel

components.description: Bontrager 15mm alloy front hub, Shimano M525 alloy rear hub; Bontrager Duster Disc 32-hole rims, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Shimano SLX M666 hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
